title: MarjorieZimmermanGinger
author: MarjorieZimmermanGinger
content: I'm in a happy mood for now and intend to share a little joy with all of you. Forums have taken me to new heights of bitcoin knowledge, nothing is more interesting to someone who has already achieved success in investing, although everyone's level of success varies. Bitcoin has changed my life to be more financially independent, the few $ I invested initially today has given me so many blessings and I have reached a very fulfilling stage.I have been planning this for so long and my faith in bitcoin has paid off, today marks four years since I have been involved in bitcoin investing on a regular basis. I have a promise with my wife, that one day I will build a house and buy a car to support our journey in life, even though she never knows how long I have been investing in bitcoin, but as a good husband I explain the details . Today he has enjoyed tangible results from the Investments I made in the previous four years.Although I didn't buy houses and cars using bitcoins directly, which makes me very happy because I get fiat from investing in bitcoins and to be honest it's very difficult to build houses and buy cars if I don't prepare my finances well. While I was more fortunate to know bitcoin, compared to my colleagues who initially doubted bitcoin.Bitcoin has changed my life to be more prepared for the financial system which is increasingly difficult to maintain its value and because of today's bitcoin I managed to build a small palace for us to live in with my wife and children. This is really a great achievement that I got in bitcoin, how was your experience?

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: First i will have to congratulate you on the journey so far for believing and having strong faith in bitcoin. Usually it's your determination that leads you to this level because in some cases there are people that decides to venture into bitcoin investment but couldn't controlled their feelings and emotion towards watching seeing their investment sink down to bottomless part without taking action to recover some investment.Since you have decided to bear risk and have patient then you enjoyed the fruit of having patient. There are lots of numerous testimonies that have been shared here about bitcoin and we return all the thank to the Founder who put up this unique idea to create bitcoin for the World.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: MarjorieZimmermanGinger on March 27, 2023, 09:01:03 PMI have been planning this for so long and my faith in bitcoin has paid off, today marks four years since I have been involved in bitcoin investing on a regular basis.Today I have exactly five years since I came to this forum and gradually began to study bitcoin. I envy your fortitude, OP, because you've obviously seen Bitcoin at $67,000 without being tempted to sell. Is it true? Four years is a good line for holding, but after the high price, it's been two years since Bitcoin can't pick up this price, can we say that you are in a good win?In any case, I think your height will now be $100,000 or more. Stay on your goals and don't give up. I see many people here on the forum whose lives are changing because of Bitcoin, and I hope your goals lead you to success in the same way.

comments.author: Cuenta Alternativa
comments.body: Well, as I have said in other similar threads, now we are only missing the one who says he bought a yacht thanks to bitcoin. If you say you have bought houses and cars, only investing for four years in which the bitcoin has done x7, what you say is either a lie or is that you started from a very large initial capital.Using https://dcabtc.com/ we can see that $100 monthly invested during those for 4 years would result in $7,769 as of today, which is not enough to buy houses and cars.And if we put in $100 a week, which many people on the forum can't invest, we get $31,984 , which gives you enough to buy a car, but not houses and cars in plural.The return using DCA has been good but not magical, as you try to make believe.

comments.author: Mr.corol
comments.body: Congratulations you have found success in your Bitcoin investment. In fact, investing in Bitcoin will fulfill the dreams of many. Bitcoin can change people's life. You enjoy your beautiful life. I wish you good days ahead.I have also invested in Bitcoin. I hope one day I will be successful from this investment. I have unrealistic dreams, I will be able to fulfill my dream one day from this bitcoin investment. I love Bitcoin.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Quote from: MarjorieZimmermanGinger on March 27, 2023, 09:01:03 PMhow was your experience?I don't know the country you live in, but buying a house and a car is so expensive where i live, and i don't have any .Bitcoin can help people to financial success, but they either have to be early miners or adopters, or they have great skills they offer and earn BTC, or they have a lot of money in real life and can buy a lot of BTC and hold it for a very long time, so when the price rises, they make attractive returns. At this point i don't know how i can afford all these with BTC, and i don't really care, i'm just happy i can use a censorship resistant currency, and i can keep a part of my money all by myself without a third party, all by using a self custody wallet.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: MarjorieZimmermanGinger on March 27, 2023, 09:01:03 PMBitcoin has changed my life to be more prepared for the financial system which is increasingly difficult to maintain its value and because of today's bitcoin I managed to build a small palace for us to live in with my wife and children. This is really a great achievement that I got in bitcoin, how was your experience?Your story is encouraging and a motivation to everyone who wishes to develop consistency in investing. For someone to have been consistently investing in bitcoins for four years requires a lot of discipline, commitment and sacrifices because within that four years it is very impossible to say that you faced no kind of situation that threatened your resolve to continue investing till you achieve success. Your attitude is one to be copied. Your patience finally paid off and I am happy for you and your family. If bitcoins got you a house, It has the potential to get you more houses, properties and a comfortable life for you and your family with proper planning, patience and knowledge.

comments.author: Cuenta Alternativa
comments.body: By rereading the OP carefully I'm calling BS on the story.Quote from: MarjorieZimmermanGinger on March 27, 2023, 09:01:03 PM the few $ I invested initially today has given me so many blessings and I have reached a very fulfilling stage.<...>Bitcoin has changed my lifeIn my previous mathematical analysis I said that either he was starting from a large capital or the story is made up. He claims to have started with little capital and that investing in bitcoin has changed his life, so the story is made up. Besides the fact that he does not provide any evidence to support the story he tells.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: Congratulations, it's just one of the success stories that we've got on this community and there are more from all over the world that has to share this type of story upon investing in bitcoin. While we're enthusiastic and happy to read stories like this, on the other hand, there are also unsuccessful stories that's also better to be shared or not to be heard. Going on OP's story, having a house and a car are the things that we want to have when we settle and start our own family. And by having these possessions with the help of bitcoin as you've made profits from it, it is going to be remarkable forever in your life that you'll never forget the journey that you've got as you invest in bitcoin. It's just the start and many more, there's no exit in bitcoin but this is the exit when financial system shows more trouble.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on March 28, 2023, 11:28:42 AMOP, because you've obviously seen Bitcoin at $67,000 without being tempted to sell. Is it true? Four years is a good line for holding, but after the high price, it's been two years since Bitcoin can't pick up this price, can we say that you are in a good win?I thought of that ATH (around $69k, actually) in 2021 too and if they didn't sell then, why they didn't but decided to sell now that's far below half of its current ATH. Then I thought perhaps OP also trades Futures or has been on DCA. Whatever approach OP used, it's a welcome development. That's the hope of everyone here, to achieve something tangible from our Bitcoin investments. Kudos, OP.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Congratulations @OP for having your own house and a car, thanks to signature campaign and Bitcoin Bitcoin isn't a quick money making, so you need to have a stable job which you can use to buy more Bitcoin, that's why understanding basic about Bitcoin is already enough, what people need is to learn about new skill in order to earn more money. Most people fallen to learn about trading, this is the reason why most of traders are lose, only some can make money.

comments.author: Flexystar
comments.body: Good to see you rolling through the blockchain and bitcoin city! I’m happy that you are telling everything to your wife because thats the right thing to do. Hehe. Well in my case I’m using or got involved in the bitcoin since 6 years. I knew about bitcoin way before that but never dared to invest until I got full confidence in it. It’s a different story that we all have regretted this once ever in our life. I do have plans since 2-3 years and continuously saving bitcoins (Satoshi ideally) and trying to forget how much amount I have in my ledger. This can help me get to my goals quicker. Still far away from owning full bitcoin. Hope so everyone on the forum stays here until we get old and still talk how we did it.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Even though I cannot say I have made a quarter of your bitcoin fortune, but I celebrate my little wins in my own way. It gives me a sense of pride that you made such huge success by investing in bitcoins. I have stacked some sats for about two years and still hodling. I believe you must have made consistent investment in the last four years and sold in the bull run to able to afford these luxuries. Congratulations OP, hope you still have some sats saved.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Op congratulations to you on your achievement. Although I haven't spend the same time as you have in Bitcoin and I also my time here in this forum is not up to a year and yet I have been able to experience some life changing experience through Bitcoin. Quote from: Cuenta Alternativa on March 28, 2023, 12:06:59 PM~Besides the fact that he does not provide any evidence to support the story he tells. One thing I have come to believe after a reply I received for one of my comments here in the forum is that; you can never please the human mind, even if you do what they want they are still going to look for other excuses just to make sure they find faults. Take a look at this thread Evidence that I actually invested for my baby, after so many people demanded for evidence from the Op of that thread, he decided to share his wallet balance with the forum and instead of the forum to just overlook and accept the proof they went on demanding for more proofs. Same thing apply here, if Op should provide proof others will still look for fault from the post.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Some people would find this kind of topic pointless as anyone could make up the same story without needing to provide any proof. You have every right to speak up and say whatever you want about what you've accomplished in the last 4 years of your investments but I disagree when you raise a lot of suspicion about the authenticity of the story here. I mean, a few dollars is impossible to buy a car, build a house or some other kind of high value, you have to have a budget of thousands of dollars to achieve anything. Some $ is impossible.I only understand one thing that with bitcoin anyone can change his life financially. Regardless of whether you are telling the truth or or just make up stories about accomplishment, it is not uncommon to say that many people have had success with their bitcoin investment. I can consider your whole story untrue, but it is always possible to achieve financial perfection with bitcoin.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: It's really a great achievement, and that's a result from one who is submissive and committed to his believe. And I believe the achievement won't just end on building a small apartment but will probably lead you to your other out listed visions. Holding Bitcoin is something that requires courage and determination which will guide you not to sell out of panic until you achieve a great goal.. Congratulations on your new home built using Bitcoin investment.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Glad to know that, you are benefited from investing in the Bitcoins.  No one understands the value of a particular object or thing, until and unless they see positive attitude from it.  I remember when price of the coin was around 1000$, no one really cared what Bitcoins are about.  They also declared Bitcoins as illegal and said it is used by terrorists only, but when Bitcoins breached 20k usd mark, all just started praising it, and ran after it to buy.  Nevertheless OP i am happy to see that you used all your decisions wisely and been continuously investing in the coin.  I wish soon you fulfil your dream of buying house and car with Bitcoins.
